title: Top & Jungler needed for Team
body:
Hello to whom reads this,

Our team is currently in search for a Top laner and Jungler, Mid/Adc/Sup role are already filled.

The requirements for joining are:

Working Mic
Must be in Plat or Gold IN FLEX <<<<<
Must be able to adapt to the meta, yes it is pre-season but the meta will quickly form.
Playing hours TBD

Here are our ranks, so you have an idea

Mid: Plat 5 s/d - Plat 3 Flex
ADC: Plat 5 s/d - Plat 3 Flex
Sup: Plat 4 s/d - Gold 4 Flex

if you think this is for you and you want to be in a team environment, Add "Shiney" or "Zami" and we'll get back to you ASAP.

(on a serious note, being in a flex team is amazing. It brings out the competitive atmosphere, its a great feeling win or lose) {{sticker:sg-miss-fortune}}

replies.body: I'm plat 5 atm, I play mid and jungle and am looking for a team. Please add and message me on league
im gold 5 flex and gold 5 solo q, idk if im good enought but add me, also we could do a sumsoc tounrament too if u guys wnated.
I'm digging top n jg, but I'm not on your lvl, good luck on the rift.
